original_title: Charles Bukowski: The Wicked Life of America's Most Infamous Poet
overview: During his lifetime, Charles Bukowski produced a large, distinctive, widely beloved body of work and changed modern American writing by bringing poetry to a street level where it could be read and enjoyed by the average man.
tagline: The Wicked Life of America's Most Infamous Poet
title: Charles Bukowski: The Wicked Life of America's Most Infamous Poet
